commands.about:
Mae Tickets yn fot hawdd i'w ddefnyddio ac yn hawdd ei addasu ar gyfer cymorth. 
Gweinydd cymorth: https://discord.gg/ticketsbot
Gorchmynion: Teipiwch '/help'
Cychwynna drwy redeg '/setup'
commands.add.no_members: Mae'n rhaid i ti enwi aelodau i'w ychwanegu at y tocyn
commands.add.no_permission: Does gennyt ti ddim caniatâd i ychwanegu pobl at y tocyn

commands.language.invalid: Mae'n rhaid i ti nodi côd iaith neu faner. Ieithoedd sydd ar gael:\n%s

commands.open.too_many_tickets:
Mae gormod o docynnau yn y categori tocynnau. Gofynnwch i weinyddwr gau rhai, symud nhw i gategori arall, neu sefydlu categori drosflwyddiad.

Mae hyn yn **gyfyngiad wedi'i osod gan Discord** o 50 sianel yn y categori.
commands.premium:
Gallwch brynu tanysgrifiad premiwm o <https://www.patreon.com/ticketsbot-cloud>.
Premiwm yn cynnig llawer o fanteision, fel:
```diff
+ Creu paneli tocyn di-gyfyng
+ Addasu enw’r bot, ei lun proffil a’i statws (whitelabel)
+ Ystadegau manwl am y gweinydd, defnyddwyr a staff cymorth
+ Dim brandio yn y troedyn negeseuon
+ Cefnogi datblygiad a helpu talu costau’r gweinydd
```

Fel arall, gallwch bleidleisio yn <https://vote.tickets.bot> i gael premiwm am ddim am 24 awr
commands.premium.invalid_key: Allwedd anghywir. Sicrhewch eich bod wedi'i gopio'n gywir.

commands.vote:
Cliciwch y botwm isod i bleidleisio dros y bot a chael 24 awr o bremiwm am ddim.

Unwaith i ti bleidleisio, rheda'r gorchymyn %s eto i hawlio dy gredydau pleidleisio.

premium.subscription_found_content: I gyflwyno dy danysgrifiad i'r gweinydd hwn, mae'n rhaid i berchennog y gweinydd (<@%d>) dy ychwanegu di fel gweinyddwr **defnyddiwr** (anwybyddir rolau) drwy ddefnyddio'r gorchymyn </addadmin:%d>.\n\nGallwch wirio dy fod wedi cael dy ychwanegu fel gweinyddwr trwy redeg </viewstaff:%d>.
premium.success_after_check: Mae Premiwm yn weithredol yn y gweinydd hwn nawr!
premium.no_subscription: Ni lwyddwyd i ddod o hyd i danysgrifiad Patreon gweithredol wedi'i gysylltu hefo dy gyfrif Discord. Sicirhewch fod [dy gyfrif Patreon a Discord wedi ei cysylltu](https://support.patreon.com/hc/en-us/articles/212052266-Get-my-Discord-role), ac arhoswch am 10 munud pellach.

key.description: Dewiswch y dewis hwn os cafodd allwedd rhodd ei roi i ti

patreon.description: Dewiswch y dewis hwn os gwnaethoch brynu ar Patreon

discord.description: Dewisiwch yr opsiwn hwn os gwnaethoch brynu drwy siop fewnol Discord

premium.about: Mae Premiwm yn rhoi mynediad i fwy o baneli, ystadegau, bot personol a mwy! Ewch i'n [gwefan](https://tickets.bot/premium) i ddysgu mwy.
premium.already_activated: Newyddion da! Mae premiwm yn weithredol yn y gweinydd hwn yn barod.
premium.already_activated_whitelabel:
Newyddion da! Mae premiwm yn weithredol yn y gweinydd hwn yn barod.

I gael cymorth i ddechrau gyda whitelabel, darllenwch ein [canllaw sefydlu whitelabel](https://docs.tickets.bot/premium/whitelabel-setup-guide).

discord.no_subscription:
Gellir prynu Premiwm yn uniongyrchol o fewn Discord. Clicia'r botwm isod i agor tudalen rheoli'r tanysgrifiad.

Ar ôl prynu, gall gymryd hyd at 5 munud i ganfod y tanysgrifiad.

premium.subscription_found_content_modern: Mae dy danysgrifiad Patreon wedi'i ganfod. Clicia'r botwm "Agor Dewisydd Gweinydd" isod i agor y dangosfwrdd a dewis pa weinyddion wyt ti am ddefnyddio dy danysgrifiad Premiwm arnyn nhw.

gdpr.intro: Select the type of GDPR request you would like to make:

section.transcript:
### **Transcript Deletion Options**
-# _Delete transcripts from servers you own_
section.message:
### **Message Anonymization Options**
-# _Anonymize your messages from transcripts in selected servers_

gdpr.warning:
### **Important Information**
* Deletion is **permanent** and cannot be undone
* You can only delete transcripts from servers **you** own
* Only **your** messages can be anonymized in transcripts
* The request may take up to **30 days** to complete
* Your request will be processed in a **queue**
gdpr.resources:
### **Resources**
[What is GDPR?](%s)
[Right to Erasure](%s)
[Right of Access](%s)

modal.specific_messages: Anonymize Your Messages in Specific Tickets

server_ids.label: Server IDs
server_ids.placeholder: Enter server IDs separated by commas (e.g., 1071167333265047653, 1412752753348055111)

ticket_ids.label: Ticket IDs
ticket_ids.placeholder: Enter ticket IDs separated by commas (e.g., 123, 456, 789)

followup.error: ⚠️ Your GDPR request encountered an error: %s
followup.no_data: ℹ️ Your GDPR request has been processed. No data was found.
followup.success: ✅ Your GDPR request has been processed successfully.

error.no_servers: No servers found where you are the owner and have transcripts.
error.invalid_ticket_ids: Invalid ticket IDs provided. Please enter numeric ticket IDs separated by commas (e.g., 123, 456, 789).
error.not_owner: You must be the server owner to delete transcripts.
error.queue_failed: Failed to queue GDPR request. Please try again later.
error.worker_offline: The GDPR processing service is currently unavailable. Please try again later or contact support if this issue persists.

errors.unknown_channel:
Could not find a required channel: it must have been deleted.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and verify all channel settings are configured correctly.
errors.unknown_member: The user could not be found. They may have left the server or been banned.
errors.unknown_message:
The message you're trying to interact with has been deleted.

Please try the action again with a different message.
errors.unknown_role:
The role required for this action no longer exists.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and reconfigure role settings.
errors.unknown_category:
Could not find a required category: it must have been deleted.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and assign a valid channel category to this ticket panel.
errors.unknown_interaction:
This interaction has expired.

Please try the action again.
errors.max_webhooks:
The server has reached the maximum number of webhooks.

Please ask a server administrator to remove some unused webhooks and try again.
errors.interaction_acknowledged:
This interaction has already been processed.

If you need to perform this action again, please start a new interaction.

missing_permissions.title: I am missing the following permissions required to perform this action
missing_permissions.body:
Please assign these permissions to the bot, or alternatively, the `Administrator` permission and try again.
Please visit our [docs](%s) for an explanation of why each permission is required.

errors.invalid_form: The action could not be completed due to invalid input.
errors.timed_out: The operation timed out, please try again.
errors.general: An error occurred while performing this action.
